title: Similar Font to "Mylius"
content:
Hello,   
I am looking for a font that is similar (but not the actual) to "Mylius" that was developed for British Airways.   
   
Here is some info on it: [http://www.agfamonotype.com/custom/ba.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20111231070435/http:/www.agfamonotype.com/custom/ba.asp)   
   
Thanks.   
-Will
author: winglets747

comments.content:
A few to consider:   
   
Beaufort, from Shinn Type:   
 [http://www.shinntype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20111231070435/http:/www.shinntype.com/)   
   
Optima   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/](http://web.archive.org/web/20111231070435/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/)   
   
TF Arrow   
 [http://www.treacyfaces.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20111231070435/http:/www.treacyfaces.com/)
